project_descr: UNDP and the UNOSSC aim to establish a Global Coalition of TT Networks for SSC in order to work with think tanks that are interested in SSC research & policy dialogues, with the aim of sharing knowledge, expertise, and Southern perspectives.

outputs.output_descr: UNDP and the UNOSSC aim to establish a Global Coalition of TT Networks for SSC in order to work with think tanks that are interested in SSC research & policy dialogues, with the aim of sharing knowledge, expertise, and Southern perspectives.

project_title: global coalition of tt networks for ssc
